acceptance: Inline edit (idea, category, notes) with field-specific editing state.
Category field uses dropdown with predefined lowercase options.
Notes field supports multiline input and expands row height.
Update/Complete stage only; no network until Save.
Save exports full array with ids 1..N by created_at asc; status='open'.
Category filtering with subtabs for each predefined category.
Sort dropdown includes placeholder 'Sort by...' option.
Dirty state tracking shows save button only when changes exist.
